00053   { }

00063   //  cout << "- Executing Randomize::iteration_complete()\n";

00066   
00071 static inline void randomize_vertex(PatchData &pd,
00072                                     size_t free_ind,
00073                                     double percent,
00074                                     MsqError &err)
00075 {
00076   size_t i;
00077   short j;
00078   const MsqVertex* verts = pd.get_vertex_array(err);  MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00079   const size_t num_vtx = pd.num_nodes();
00080     //a scale w.r.t. the patch size
00081   double scale_factor=0.0;
00082     //a "random" number between -1 and 1
00083   double rand_double=0.0;
00084     //a "random" int
00085   int rand_int=0;
00086   if (num_vtx<=1){
00087     MSQ_PRINT(1)("WARNING: Number of incident vertex is zero.  Returning.\n");
00088     return;
00089   }
00090 
00091   for (i=0;i<num_vtx;++i){
00092     if(i != free_ind)
00093       scale_factor+=(verts[i]-verts[free_ind]).length();
00094   }
00095   scale_factor/=( (double) num_vtx - 1.0 );    
00096   Vector3D delta;
00097   for (j=0;j<3;++j){
00098     rand_int = rand();
00099       //number between 0 and 1000
00100     rand_int = rand_int%1000;
00101       //number between -1 and 1
00102     rand_double = (((double) rand_int)/500.0)-1.0;
00103     delta[j] = scale_factor * rand_double * percent;
00104   }
00105   pd.move_vertex( delta, free_ind, err );
00106 
00107   return;
00108 }
00109 
00110 
00111 void Randomize::optimize_vertex_positions(PatchData &pd, 
00112                                                 MsqError &err)
00113 {
00114     //cout << "- Executing Randomize::optimize_vertex_position()\n";
00115 
00116   // gets the array of coordinates for the patch and print it 
00117   // does the randomize smooth
00118   MsqFreeVertexIndexIterator free_iter(pd, err); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00119   free_iter.reset();
00120   free_iter.next();
00121     //find the free vertex.
00122   int m=free_iter.value();
00123   randomize_vertex(pd, m, mPercent, err);  MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00124   pd.snap_vertex_to_domain(m,err); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00125 }
